title: High Performance Building Database
description: The Buildings Database is a shared resource for the building industry. The Database, developed by the U.S. Department of Energy and the National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL), is a unique central repository of in-depth information and data on high-performance, green building projects across the United States and abroad.

region.description: Climate Region.  Use integer from mapping (256: '1A: Very Hot - Humid', 257: '1B: Very Hot - Dry', 258: '2A: Hot - Humid', 259: '2B: Hot - Dry', 260: '3A: Warm - Humid', 261: '3B: Warm - Dry', 262: '3C: Warm - Marine', 263: '4A: Mixed - Humid', 264: '4B: Mixed - Dry', 265: '4C: Mixed - Marine', 266: '5A: Cool - Humid', 267: '5B: Cool - Dry', 268: '5C: Cool - Marine', 269: '6A: Cold - Humid', 270: '6B: Cold - Dry', 271: '7: Very Cold', 272: '8: Subarctic')

actions.title: document
actions.description: This API allows users to request metadata associated with the specific Document.
